colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI JANG JUNG CHEN PO TSE WANG GI MNGA' 'BAS, ,DAR HAN TZAS SANG NANG SO DGE BSKOS BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL DAR RGYAS MER GEN NANG SIO DGE SLONG DBU MDZAD SANGS RGYAS PHUN TSOGS SOGS SGROL MA NYER GCIG GI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, ,SKYABS NAS DAM PA BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL @014B MGON MING CAN GYIS BYIS PA LA DGE BA CUNG ZAD YON NA DE YIS BSTAN DANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DANG BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG GI SKU TSE BRTAN PA DANG DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,MA GYUR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA GNAS SKABS DANG MTHUR THUG GI PHAN BDE'I RGYUR CIG , ,,)
